empty_base

Synopsis

struct empty_base {};

Description

An empty base class. Inheritance from empty_base through the inherit metafunction is a no-op.

Header

#include <boost/mpl/empty_base.hpp>

See also

Data Types, inherit, inherit_linearly, void_
